addr: 1125 N McCadden Pl. Los Angeles, CA 90038
title: A Clear Path - Clear Away the Clutter and Organize Your Life
desc: Is your home or office filled with clutter that just won't go away? Have you gotten used to life among the rubble? Take charge of the mess in your home and/or office once and for all. With the help of various fun and easy techniques, you will learn how to turn your chaos into an organized and? clutter-free expression of the person you are inside. ? Instructor:  Regina Lark, Ph.D.,CPO ? Course Meeting Schedule: Wed., Mar. 24 Course Meeting Times: 7 - 9 p.m.
